alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Stone; Van Buren County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 12:16PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Stone, east central Searcy, northeastern Van Buren and south central Baxter Counties through 1245 PM CDT... At 1215 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Thola, or 12 miles west of Mountain View, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mountain View... Thola... Elba... Old Lexington... Elberta... Blanchard Springs Campground... Alco... Hanover... Rushing... Turkey Creek... Luber... Fifty-Six... Oxley... Flag... Arlberg... Fox... Onia... Timbo... Gunner Pool Campground... Barkshed Campground... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Baxter; Stone; Van Buren County Higher Elevations
